actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Labor to submit to Congress the report on method of allocating administrative funds among States required under section 304 of the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1991.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Labor to submit to the Congress, within 90 days after enactment of this Act, the report on method of allocating administrative funds among States which is required by specified provisions of the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1991.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Labor to submit to Congress the report on method of allocating administrative funds among States required under section 304 of the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1991.
